title: hotkeys not working
body: so I was in a game earlier and as soon as the game started it was apparent that my hotkeys were not working except for my mouse buttons (left and right click and my two buttons that I have my summs bound to, i.e. I could flash). i could type with all of my keys (as I am now) so I know it isn't my laptop messing up. I was just wondering if there was a fix for this because i disconnected and reconnected and they still weren't working. I also jumped into a practice tool session a couple times after that game and they sill weren't working. And on top of that it wouldn't even let me change the binding to a different key (I tried pressing a different key that wasn't already bound and it didn't work)

replies.body:
Sounds like your keybinding configurations might have been messed up somehow. Run through these steps to refresh your config files, and let me know if this doesn't help.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
